venue.name: Berkman Recital Hall at Hartt School Fuller Music Building, 1st floor of Music

item.description:
Faculty Baroque Concert

Lets meet at 7:40 in the lobby for the concert which starts at 8 FREE Faculty members Emlyn Ngai, Greig Shearer, and Margreet Francis join forces in a concert for Baroque flute, violin, and harpsichord, featuring sonatas and trio sonatas by J.S. Bach and others. I advice you call up the web site below and check out the campus map to navigate to the actual hall, which does not actually sit on Bloomfield Ave.

http://harttweb.hartford.edu/events/details.aspx?sid=24717

Berkman Recital Hall
Fuller Music Building, 1st floor
200 Bloomfield Avenue
West Hartford, CT, 06117
1.800.274.8587
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby area of Berkman Recital Hall
item.name: Faculty Baroque Concert
